data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Bangkok Metropolis.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bangkok Metropolis, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Bangkok Metropolis, Thailand.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Bangkok Metropolis access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Bangkok Metropolis, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Tonga people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Tonga people.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Bangkok Metropolis, Thailand. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, comfort those who mourn in Bangkok Metropolis, Thailand.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Bangkok Metropolis, Thailand and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.
